title.rendered: BC PNP Latest Draw February 7, 2023 ~ 245 Invitations

Share Tweet Share Pin
[vc_column_text]The latest BC PNP Draw was held on February 7, 2022, and invited 245 candidates under the  BC PNP Skills Immigration Stream. The province invited 207 applicants across a General British Columbia PNP Draw and 38 candidates across the targeted categories, including Express Entry BC candidates.

  • Draw Date: February 7, 2023
  • No. of invitations: 245
  • BC PNP Stream: Skills Immigration
  • Minimum Score: Ranging from 60-102

In 2023, British Columbia issued 1,367 invitations under the BC PNP streams.[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle” column_margin=”default” column_direction=”default” column_direction_tablet=”default” column_direction_phone=”default” text_align=”left”][vc_column_inner column_padding=”padding-6-percent” column_padding_tablet=”inherit” column_padding_phone=”inherit” column_padding_position=”all” column_element_spacing=”default” centered_text=”true” background_color_opacity=”1″ background_hover_color_opacity=”1″ column_shadow=”none” column_border_radius=”none” column_link_target=”_self” gradient_direction=”left_to_right” overlay_strength=”0.3″ width=”1/1″ tablet_width_inherit=”default” bg_image_animation=”none” border_type=”simple” column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid”][nectar_btn size=”large” button_style=”regular” button_color_2=”Accent-Color” icon_family=”default_arrow” text=”Start Your Free BC PNP Assessment” url=”https://bit.ly/start-free-assessment”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_custom_heading text=”BC PNP Latest Draw: General Category” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1669814351916{margin-top: 40px !important;}”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1675874245632{padding-bottom: 40px !important;}”]British Columbia issued 207 invitations with minimum SIRS scores between 82-102 depending on the programs. The minimum scores for the individual categories are mentioned below:

Date Number of
Invitations		 Stream Minimum
Score		 Description
February 7, 2023 207 BC PNP Skilled Worker 102 General draw
(includes tech occupations)
Express Entry BC Skilled Worker 102
International Graduate 102
Express Entry BC International Graduate 102
Entry Level and Semi-Skilled Category (ELSS) 82
[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1675874785851{padding-bottom: 40px !important;}”]

BC PNP Latest Targeted Draw

BC holds targeted draws for applicants who satisfy the standards for a few in-demand National Occupational Classifications (NOCs), such as healthcare and technology.

Targeted draws might not require as high SIRS scores compared to general draws. This week, each targeted category needed SIRS scores of 60. BC invited the following applicants to their intended draws:

Number of Invitations Category Minimum Score Description/ Targeted Draw NOC TEER Code
25 Skilled Worker, International Graduate (includes EEBC option) 60 Childcare: Early childhood educators and assistants 42202
13 Skilled Worker, International Graduate (includes EEBC option) 60 Healthcare

margin_top=”20px”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_custom_heading text=”BC PNP Skills Immigration Categories” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1669814791596{margin-top: 30px !important;}”][vc_column_text]British Columbia has special immigration programs that open the door to highly trained international workers from throughout the world. These applicants often fit into the BC PNP Skills Immigration Stream. The following programs fall under this stream:

  • BC PNP Tech
  • BC PNP Skilled Worker
  • BC PNP Health Authority
  • BC PNP Semi-Skilled
  • BC PNP International Graduate
  • BC PNP International Post-Graduate
[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]

What is Express Entry BC Stream?

To find candidates qualified for one of the Express Entry BC Streams, the province of British Columbia examines the IRCC’s Express Entry pool. The province regularly chooses and welcomes foreign workers, students, and businesspeople through BC PNP. Candidates can earn an additional 600 CRS points by participating in the EEBC stream.[/vc_column_text][vc_custom_heading text=”Need help?” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1655824044795{padding-top: 40px !important;}”][vc_column_text]You can get immigration assistance from Team ELAAR’s qualified immigration specialists if you are ready to begin the BC PNP procedure. Mr. Keshav Sharma has experience with all BC PNP Programs as a Regulated Canadian Immigration Consultant (RCIC).

excerpt.rendered: British Columbia held General and Targeted draws of BC PNP on February 7, 2023. The BC PNP Latest Draw invited nearly 245 candidates with scores ranging from 60 to 102.
